Name: enforce_active_projects
Description: Only consider projects with active status

Name: require_team_status_ready
Description: Teams must be ready before assignment

Name: exclude_unavailable_workers
Description: Do not assign workers with zero availability

Name: limit_high_severity_blockers
Description: High severity blockers must be minimized

Name: require_user_story_acceptance_criteria
Description: Only stories with clear acceptance criteria

Name: prefer_high_team_type_fit
Description: Prefer teams with matching team_type for domain

Name: prefer_positive_trend_velocity
Description: Prefer teams with improving velocity trend

Name: require_backlog_status_open
Description: Product Backlog must be open to intake items

Name: limit_scrum_board_wip
Description: Keep number of cards on board within limits
